RumorFact.Text: The Nomai detected a signal coming from the device they found, I wonder if the signal can be found anywhere else?

ExploreFact.Text: I tuned my signalscope to the frequency emitted by the device the Nomai found, and picked up a matching signal in space
It seems to be coming from a point in the sky, but has not been picked up by our satelite. the only way to find out more is to go there

RumorFact.Text: It seems that the signal is coming from this dark planet

ExploreFact.Text: The planet seems deserted but I should follow the signal
The signal led me to a structure at the planet's North Pole, the structre appears to be locked

RumorFact.Text: There is a small terminal outside the structure which seems to respond to the device the Nomai found

ExploreFact.Text: The terminal is likely the way in, I should look for clues
Bringing the tablet to the terminal activated it and unlocked the door

RumorFact.Text: The inside of the structure is filled with strange technology, I should investigate

ExploreFact.Text: There is a large device in the center of the room, it seems to be the source of the signal
There is a small device on the wall that seems to be a control panel for the device, but it appears to be corroded

RumorFact.Text: I used the ancient tool and it fixed the panel

ExploreFact.Text: The computer appears to be trying to communciate with me in the same language that is on the devices
A door opened on hte side of the panel, it is big enough for my little scout
I inserted my little scout into the panel and the AI translated the language
The AI is named Loveday and she told me about her people, including the exlporer who woke whne she was about to shut down

Loveday believes the warp core will allow her to return her planet home to give them a little more life, but they don't know if the Qorks are still a dnager of if that part of the unvierse still exists

RumorFact.Text: Loveday told me the ##inside## of the planet contains a cryochamber for her people

ExploreFact.Text: I found the cryochamber, all her people are still sleeping and have been for thousands of years, it would be cruel to wake them up as the universe is ending
